isGlobal.description: Grant unlimited user access with customizable roles, to enhanced security and also allowing you to set restrictions such as Date ranges, CIDR ranges, and

isGlobal.title: Unlimited Customers/Vendors
isGlobal.description: Your data is secured with IP security and Two-way verification, and

isGlobal.title: Invoicing
isGlobal.description: Create, and send the cash and sales invoices, check payment status, set due dates, apply reverse charge

isGlobal.title: Record Bills
isGlobal.description: Create purchase order, and purchase bill, attach files in the bill, pay directly to the vendor, and

isGlobal.title: Managing Inventory
isGlobal.description: Maintain inventory of product, services, and fixed asset in group, items and variant too, easy search with barcode, and

isGlobal.title: Journal Entries
isGlobal.description: Maintain inventory of product, services, and fixed asset in group, items and variant too, easy search with barcode, and

isGlobal.title: Multi-currency
isGlobal.description: Manage invoicing and payments seamlessly across 100+ currencies, with automatic currency conversion based on real-time exchange rates and

isGlobal.title: Reports
isGlobal.description: Access various reports like Trial balance, Profit & loss, Balance sheet, Daybook, Cash flow statement, Ledger, Sales bifurcation, Columnar report, Purchase register, Sales register, Inventory reports, Reverse charge report, Autopaid, Bill to bill report and

isGlobal.title: Real-time Dashboard
isGlobal.description: View visual representation of the company data like Total overdues, Profit & loss, Bank Account balances, and

isGlobal.title: Bank Reconciliation
isGlobal.description: Connect your bank account in Giddh, and with just one click, we will compare and match the transactions of your books with your bank account and

isGlobal.title: Manufacturing
isGlobal.description: Create manufacturing recipe, do manufacturing, add manufacturing expenses, and view its reports.

isGlobal.title: Bank Integrations
isGlobal.description: Provides support in 12+ countries including USA, Canada, UK, Germany, France, Netherlands, Ireland, Spain, Sweden, Denmark, Poland, Portugal

isGlobal.title: E-commerce Integration
isGlobal.description: Shopify integration to enhance the efficiency and growth of Ecommerce business.

isGlobal.title: Telecom Integration
isGlobal.description: MSG91 integration to automate the business communication like sending invoices, payment reminder and more via Mail, SMS, Whatsapp message.

isGlobal.title: Branch and warehouse management
isGlobal.description: Efficiently manage the company's numerous branches and warehouses, access branch- and warehouse-specific reports, facilitate branch transfers, archive the branch and warehouse and perform various related tasks.

isGlobal.title: Easy Import/Export of the data
isGlobal.description: Accelerate the accounting process by importing data such as company master information, inventory details, financial entries, bank statements, and other relevant data. Effortlessly export and share data, including ledgers, invoices, reports, and many more

isGlobal.title: Financial Year Locking
isGlobal.description: You have the ability to lock a specific financial year within your company, preventing any further entries or modifications during that period

isGlobal.title: Support
isGlobal.description: You are just one call or email away from us, Connect with us
